overview: A judo team captain and his juniors goes to Tokyo to participate in the national championships. In Tokyo for the first time, the captain falls in love with a city badminton player at first sight. The coach of the judo club scolds the captain for not being able to devote himself to judo due to the conflict between competition and love.  Will they be able to achieve results in the upcoming national tournament!? And where is love going!?
title: Judo Boys
